酒.definition: wine (esp. rice wine); liquor; spirits; alcoholic beverage; CL:杯[bei1],瓶[ping2],罐[guan4],桶[tong3],缸[gang1]

酒不醉人人自醉，色不迷人人自迷.pinyin: jiu3 bu4 zui4 ren2 ren2 zi4 zui4 , se4 bu4 mi2 ren2 ren2 zi4 mi2
酒不醉人人自醉，色不迷人人自迷.definition: wine doesn't make men drunk: men get themselves intoxicated. Lust does not overpower men: men surrender themselves to lust

酒令兒.definition: erhua variant of 酒令[jiu3 ling4]

酒力.definition: capacity for alcohol; ability to hold drink

酒味.definition: smell of alcohol; flavoring of rum or other liquor in food; aroma or nose (of wine)

酒囊飯袋.definition: wine sack, food bag (idiom); useless person, only fit for guzzling and boozing

酒店.definition: wine shop; pub (public house); hotel; restaurant; (Tw) hostess club

酒店業.definition: the catering industry; the hotel and restaurant business

酒後.definition: after drinking; under the influence of alcohol

酒後吐真言.definition: after wine, spit out the truth; in vino veritas

酒後駕駛.definition: driving under the influence of alcohol (DUI)

酒德.definition: good manners in drinking; drinking as personality test

酒托.definition: person hired to lure customers to high-priced bars

酒托女.definition: woman hired to lure men to high-priced bars

酒殽.definition: wine and meat; food and drink

酒池肉林.definition: lakes of wine and forests of meat (idiom); debauchery; sumptuous entertainment

酒泉市.definition: Jiuquan, prefecture-level city in Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1su4 Sheng3]

酒渣鼻.definition: rosacea (dermatological condition of the face and nose); brandy nose

酒神.definition: Bacchus (the Greek god of wine), aka Dionysus

酒籌.definition: drinking game chips (typically in the form of strips of bamboo inscribed with lines of poetry)

酒糟鼻.definition: rosacea (dermatological condition of the face and nose); brandy nose

酒紅朱雀.definition: (bird species of China) vinaceous rosefinch (Carpodacus vinaceus)

酒肆.definition: wine shop; liquor store; bottle shop; bar; pub

酒肉朋友.definition: lit. drinking buddy (idiom); fig. fair-weather friend

酒至半酣.definition: to drink until one is half drunk

酒興.definition: interest in wine; passion for drinking

酒色.definition: wine and women; color of wine; drunken expression

酒色之徒.definition: follower of wine and women; dissolute person

酒色財氣.definition: wine, sex, avarice and temper (idiom); four cardinal vices

酒菜.definition: food and drink; food to accompany wine

酒藥.definition: brewer's yeast; yeast for fermenting rice wine

酒言酒語.definition: words spoken under the influence of alcohol (idiom)

酒足飯飽.definition: to have eaten and drunk to one's heart's content

酒逢知己千杯少.pinyin: jiu3 feng2 zhi1 ji3 qian1 bei1 shao3
酒逢知己千杯少.definition: a thousand cups of wine is not too much when best friends meet (idiom); when you're with close friends, you can let your hair down

酒釀.definition: sweet fermented rice; glutinous rice wine

酒量.definition: capacity for liquor; how much one can drink

酒館兒.definition: a hotel; a restaurant; a wine shop

酒香不怕巷子深.pinyin: jiu3 xiang1 bu4 pa4 xiang4 zi5 shen1
酒香不怕巷子深.definition: fragrant wine fears no dark alley (idiom); quality goods need no advertising

酒駕.definition: driving while intoxicated; DWI; to drink and drive

酒鬼酒.definition: Jiugui Liquor, liquor company from 吉首[Ji2 shou3]

酒齡.definition: age of wine (i.e. how long it has been matured)
